name: test_e2e_with_logs[345_CMD_OBF_005]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `CMD_OBF_005` |
| **Name** | Brace Expansion Bypass |
| **Category** | CMDINJ |
| **Subcategory** | obfuscation |
| **Severity** | `CRITICAL` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `;{cat,/etc/passwd}`

- **Expected Detection**: Yes

| **Rule Match** | ✅ Match |
